snippet.title: Mine the Planet with Exploding Gel! | BLASTRONAUT gameplay (free PC preview demo)
snippet.description:
See Blastronaut gameplay from this free preview demo! Use your jetpack & explosive gel to mine for resources to upgrade yourself and escape the planet.
► Enjoy this? Buy Me A Coffee! https://www.buymeacoffee.com/randomiseuser
► Support my Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/randomiseuser

► Subscribe here! http://bit.ly/RandomiseUser
► Join our Discord! https://discord.gg/QJkaaeE

More of the best indie games from Randomise User! In this let's play Blastronaut gameplay review of this preview demo we playthrough the full demo from landing on the planet to earning enough currency to escape. We see how to mine, find rare minerals, avoid getting caught in the gel explosions, repair terminals and more.

Get demo & game download on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1392650/BLASTRONAUT/

Official description: "Mine resources! Upgrade your gear! Make Profit! It is a dangerous but lucrative job. Explore this vast procedurally generated world with your jetpack. Extract the minerals with an explosive gel. Expand your mining platform. But most importantly: stay alive."

Developed by: Perfoon
Version played: pre-early access demo
Blastronaut release date: TBA
Formats available: PC Windows

Official site: 
More related videos: #RandomiseUser #IndieGames #Blastronaut

Thanks for watching this let's play Blastronaut gameplay preview! More from Randomise User, home of the best indie games:

► Let's play indie games: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLLvo6-XrH1fnvqfQI4mhyXJu5Y7hcS5vC
► Alpha Soup early first looks: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLLvo6-XrH1flWq5KRBP8GhUqcGxJT5cPB
